section.para: To view Items by Characteristic, select the "Items by Characteristic" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Items by Characteristic, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select a Characteristic from the list of Characteristics designated as being available for use as Item Characteristics.
Enter the Characteristic value whose associated Items you want to include in the display.
Select to include inactive Items in the display.
Display lists Items by Characteristic, using the specified parameters.
